keys: Educación religiosa. Religiones del mundo. Páginas web relevantes
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6919</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Festivals of Major World Religions - Crossword</string>
            <string language="es">Festivales de las principales religiones del mundo - Crucigrama</string>
            <string language="ga">Féilte Móra Reiligiúin an Domhain – Crosfhocal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Festivals der Hauptweltreligionen - 
Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Festivals des religions principales du monde - 
mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festivals de religiões principais do mundo - 
crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festival delle religioni importanti del mondo -
parole incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φεστιβάλ σημαντικών παγκόσμιων θρησκειών - σταυρόλεξο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Try your luck with this crossword. Clues are given for some of the major festivals of world religions. It's worth getting to know these - they are a favourite in the exam.</string>
            <string language="es">Prueba la suerte con este crucigrama. Se dan pistas para algunos de los  festivales de las principales religiones del mundo. Vale la pena saber sobre ellos, son temas favoritos en el examen.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bain triail as an gcrosfhocal seo. Tugtar leideanna ar chuid d’fhéilte móra a bhíonn ag reiligiúin an domhain. Is fiú iad seo a fhoghlaim – bíonn siad ar an scrúdú go minic.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa. Religiones del mundo. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World Religions</string>
            <string language="ga">Reiligiúin an Domhain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versuchen Sie Ihr Glück mit diesem 
Kreuzworträtsel. Anhaltspunkte werden für einige der 
Hauptfestivals der Weltreligionen gegeben. Sie ist wert das 
Beginnen, diese zu wissen - sie sind ein Liebling in der Prüfung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essayez votre chance avec ces mots croisé. 
Des indices sont donnés pour certains des festivals principaux 
des religions du monde. Il est intéressant finir par savoir ces
derniers - elles sont un favori dans l'examen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tente sua sorte com este crossword. Os 
indícios são dados para alguns dos festivals principais de 
religiões do mundo. É worth conhecer estes - são um favorito 
no exam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Provi la vostra fortuna con queste parole 
incrociate. Gli indizii sono dati per alcuni dei festival 
principali delle religioni del mondo. È degno familiarizzarsi 
con questi - sono un favorito nel exam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμάστε την τύχη σας με αυτό το σταυρόλεξο. Οι
ενδείξεις δίνονται για μερικά από τα σημαντικότερα φεστιβάλ των 
παγκόσμιων θρησκειών. Αξίζει να ξέρει αυτών - είναι μια 
συμπάθεια στο διαγωνισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltreligionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religions du Monde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religiões Do Mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religioni Del Mondo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site Relativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμιες θρησκείες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικοί ιστοχώροι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
